User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the CollabDraw application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

email.description: The email address of the user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Whiteboard entity.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the whiteboard was created.

lastModified.description: The timestamp when the whiteboard was last modified.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns the whiteboard.

DrawingEvent.title: DrawingEvent
DrawingEvent.description: Represents a single drawing event on the whiteboard.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DrawingEvent entity.

eventData.description: JSON string containing the data for the drawing event (e.g., coordinates, color, shape type, text).

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the drawing event occurred.

ChatMessage.title: ChatMessage
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message in a whiteboard chat.

userId.description: The UID of the user who sent the message.

userName.description: The name of the user who sent the message.

text.description: The content of the chat message.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the message was sent.

Participant.title: Participant
Participant.description: Represents a user currently in a whiteboard session.

name.description: The display name of the user for this session.

definition.description: Stores all whiteboards for the application.
Stores drawing events for a whiteboard.
Stores chat messages for a specific whiteboard.
Stores the list of active participants in a whiteboard.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to be scalable and secure. Whiteboards are a top-level collection, allowing for easy querying. Drawing events, chat messages, and participants are stored in subcollections under each whiteboard, which simplifies security rules and data retrieval for a specific room. This ensures that data is logically grouped and access can be controlled granularly.
